name: qiniu-webpack-plugin
description: Webpack plugin for Qiniu cloud storage

scripts.release:minor: npm run compile && npm version minor && npm publish --reg=http://registry.cnpm.xinpinget.com
scripts.release:patch: npm run compile && npm version patch && npm publish --reg=http://registry.cnpm.xinpinget.com
scripts.compile: rimraf example/public && rimraf lib && babel src --copy-files --source-maps --out-dir lib
scripts.example:production: npm run-script compile && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --config example/webpack.production.js
scripts.test:coveralls: npm run test && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage

author: wyvernnot
